description: Natasha Yar has her beginning on the failed Federation colony Turkana IV, where she was born in 2337. Orphaned at a young age, she spent her early years fighting for survival and eking out an existance for herself and her sister. Tasha managed to escape Turkana IV in 2352 and joined Starfleet soon after. The lawlessness of Tasha's harsh beginnings were her inspiration for becoming a Starfleet security officer, and her bravery and warrios's soul allowed her to flourish in the role. Tasha's mastery of martial arts and hand-to-hand combat makes her a formidable opponent and a valued chief of security on the USS Enterprise-D. In her free time, Tasha likes to hone her aikido skills on the holodeck and participate in martial-arts and parrises squares touranments with other members of the Enterprise crew

captain_maneuver.name: Security Officer
captain_maneuver.bonus: Tasha Yar reduces the Crit Chance of Mission Hostiles (yellow hostiles) by {value}

officer_ability.name: Code of Honor
officer_ability.bonus: Tasha Yar increases all Weapon Damage against non-player targets by {value}
